import string as st
digits = '1234567890'

filein = open('../input/aboutapple/apple.txt','r').read()
print("\nInput Text:",filein)
   
filein = ''.join(filein.strip())
filein = ''.join([c for c in filein if c not in st.punctuation])
filein = ''.join([c for c in filein if c not in digits])
filein = ' '.join(filein.split())

wordlist = filein.split(' ')

wordcount = len(wordlist)

wdict = {'words':'frequency'}

for word in wordlist:
    wdict[word] = wdict.get(word,0)+1
uniquew=len(wdict)

print("\n Clean Text:\n",filein)

print("\nWordcount:",wordcount)
print("\nUnique Words:",uniquew)

word_freq = [] 
for key, value in wdict.items():
   word_freq.append((value, key))
print("Word Freq : \n",word_freq)
    
dictionary = ['Apple' , 'Google' , 'growth' , 'portfolios' , 'mortgage','company','portfolios' ]

kword_freq = {}

for word in wordlist:
    if word in dictionary:
        kword_freq[word]=kword_freq.get(word,0)+1
        
  
for word in dictionary:
    if word not in wordlist:
        kword_freq[word]=kword_freq.get(word,0)
    
        
#print("\nKeyword Frequency:",kword_freq)

kword_dict = [] 
for key, value in kword_freq.items():
   kword_dict.append((value, key))
print("\nKeyWord Freq : \n",kword_dict)
